channel.title: First Post on Haiiro
channel.description: Recent content in First Post on Haiiro

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
# Hello World.

A new site! Woah!

Yeah, I decided to adopt Hugo. It’s easy to use, and I can write about things that might interest me. I’m not quite sure what it will be, and I might not even write anything at all. This is just something that’s nice to have. I will most likely only do some posts about some random code I wrote, or a bigger project I work on. We’ll see.

The theme is based on the Stack theme. I modified it to fit my black and white aesthetic.
